simula.runtime

Class Driver

  • java.lang.Object
    • simula.runtime.Driver

  • public class Driver
extends java.lang.Object
    Drivers.

    Drivers are used to carry system information about the interrelationship between the various block instances. The driver is kept separate from the block instance since, in certain situations, this information can be discarded while the block instance survives, e.g. a referencable terminated class object. In other cases, one block instance may have several drivers indicating several different environments, e.g. in inspection and name parameter transmission.

    Author:
    Øystein Myhre Andersen

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean aux
      If set, this driver is not a maste driver.
      int blockLevel
      Static block level (copied from prototype) except in the case of inspection when block level is one higher than the block level og the block instance containing the inspection statement.
      boolean connected
      If set, this driver is either an inspection driver or is a substitute driver created by a call on a connected or remote procedure.
      boolean detached
      If set, the associated block instance is detached.
      Driver drex
      If the associated block instance is attached this is a pointer to the driver of the block instance to which the instance is attached (also called dynamic link), i.e. it points to the driver of the block instance which called this one.
      Driver drp
      This is a pointer to the driver of the nearest textually enclosing block instance, also called 'static link'.
      boolean localClasses
      If set, the associated block has local classes.
      boolean OB
      If set, the associated block is a class or a prefixed block.
      RTObject obj
      This is a pointer to the object belonging to this driver.
      boolean PB
      If set, the associated block is a prefixed block (copied from prototype).
      ProgramPoint pex
      If the associated block instance is attached, e.g. procedure, this contains the return address.
      boolean remote
      If set, this is the driver of a procedure called remotely or in an inspection block.

    • Field Detail

      • obj

        public RTObject obj
        This is a pointer to the object belonging to this driver.

      • drp

        public Driver drp
        This is a pointer to the driver of the nearest textually enclosing block instance, also called 'static link'.

      • drex

        public Driver drex
        If the associated block instance is attached this is a pointer to the driver of the block instance to which the instance is attached (also called dynamic link), i.e. it points to the driver of the block instance which called this one.

      • pex

        public ProgramPoint pex
        If the associated block instance is attached, e.g. procedure, this contains the return address.

        If the associated block instance is detached this is a pointer to the program part of the reactivation point.

      • blockLevel

        public int blockLevel
        Static block level (copied from prototype) except in the case of inspection when block level is one higher than the block level og the block instance containing the inspection statement.

      • connected

        public boolean connected
        If set, this driver is either an inspection driver or is a substitute driver created by a call on a connected or remote procedure.

      • aux

        public boolean aux
        If set, this driver is not a maste driver.

      • detached

        public boolean detached
        If set, the associated block instance is detached.

      • remote

        public boolean remote
        If set, this is the driver of a procedure called remotely or in an inspection block.

      • PB

        public boolean PB
        If set, the associated block is a prefixed block (copied from prototype).

      • OB

        public boolean OB
        If set, the associated block is a class or a prefixed block. (copied from prototype).

      • localClasses

        public boolean localClasses
        If set, the associated block has local classes. (Copied from prototype).
